title: The Third note
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities

abstract: Neighbours discover a common bond after battling each other with sound
description: A blind woman and her Russian neighbour do battle with sound and music when he refuses to read a postcard for her. What starts as war ends in understanding. Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski        Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski
